title: Frontier ping spikes
body: So, basically I'm asking for some thoughts on my problem. My problem is w/ Frontier I usually have around 40 ping which is amazing, but there are times and I feel its becoming more frequent where I have these ping spikes where my ping just sticks at 600+ for the rest of the game. I was reading up on some other people's thoughts with the similar problems and I heard something about the different server. Could that be it? Or is it just Frontier?

replies.body: There could be an issue with your ISP, but there might also be more local issues making it difficult to reach the game servers.  Try out the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide first to rule out possibilities.  Let me know your results!
